response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just a possession but a symbol of excellence and craftsmanship. I am offering it to you at a special price of $750,000, believing that its true worth lies in the hands of someone who will appreciate it fully. I trust that this offer will be considered carefully by you, as it represents a significant investment that could potentially enrich your collection or business in ways unforeseen. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable item with you.", "product_price": 750000}
